briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Study Using ABT-335 (Investigational Drug) in Combination With Atorvastatin, to Study the Effects on Thickening of the Blood Vessel Wall in Patients With Abnormal Lipid (Fat) Levels in the Blood
officialTitle: Evaluation of Choline Fenofibrate (ABT-335) on Carotid Intima-Media Thickness (cIMT) in Subjects With Type IIb Dyslipidemia With Residual Risk in Addition to Atorvastatin Therapy (FIRST) Trial
summary: The primary purpose of this study is to test the effect and safety of once daily ABT-335 on the thickness of the lining of the carotid artery (a blood vessel to the brain) in patients with abnormal blood lipids who have optimal levels of low density lipoprotein cholesterol ("bad cholesterol") after taking atorvastatin.

primaryOutcome.measure: Rate of Change in Mean Posterior-wall Carotid Intima-media Thickness (cIMT)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline, 6 months, 12 months, 18 months, and 24 months
